DOC.brief_summary: Cross design investigator divide participant two group group ( A ) receive rapid heat cure denture base material group ( b ) receive acrylic denture modify titanium dioxide nanoparticles washout period alternatively group ( ) receive acrylic denture modify titanium dioxide nanoparticles AND group ( b ) receive rapid heat cure denture base material investigator take swap dentures count anaerobic bacteria .
DOC.brief_title: Microbiological Study Maxillary Complete Dentures Two Different Materials
DOC.detailed_description: First investigator take primary impression , pour obtain primary cast , fabricate special tray take secondary impression obtain master cast duplication master cast do investigator make cross design.and divide participant two group group ( A ) receive rapid heat cure denture base material group ( b ) receive acrylic denture modify titanium dioxide nanoparticle washout period alternatively group ( ) receive acrylic denture modify titanium dioxide nanoparticle AND group ( b ) receive rapid heat cure denture base material investigator take swap different denture count anaerobic bacteria ( CFU ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Completely edentulous maxillary arch partially dentate mandibular arch adequate interarch space . 2 . The edentulous ridge cover firm healthy mucosa . 3Angle class I maxillomandibular relation . 4Healthy cooperative patient 1 . Patients bad habit severe clench bruxism , drug alcohol addiction , moderate heavy smoking ( great 10 cigarette per day ) . 2 . Previous history radiotherapy chemotherapy . 3 . Any skeletal problem dictate surgical intervention
